title: Weekly AI Edge #24
description: Ever ask for $50,000 and actually got it? Someone did, and its chilling how AI can be jailbroken
author: Teng Yan, Josh
full_content:
GM

Trump: ‚ÄúI am pleased to announce that David O. Sacks will be the White House AI & Crypto Czar‚Äù

Wait, what? Didn‚Äôt see that coming. Somehow, our favourite All-In tech bro just got handed the keys to the kingdom for the coming AI and crypto cycle.

But here‚Äôs the real kicker: Trump managed to put ‚ÄúAI‚Äù and ‚ÄúCrypto‚Äù in the same sentence. That alone has 2025 looking pretty bullish for us.

Meanwhile, the space‚Äîespecially AI agents‚Äîis moving at warp speed. After chatting with a bunch of teams, it‚Äôs starting to be clear who‚Äôs truly pushing the frontier‚Äîand who‚Äôs stuck building tech that might‚Äôve been cutting-edge six months ago but feels irrelevant today.

Remember: Memes are just the gateway drug to the real revolution brewing in Crypto AI.

-Teng Yan

In this edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Ever asked for $50,000 and received it? This person did
Chappie‚Äôs 10 predictions for tokenised AI agents
If AGI were to escape, it would happen on crypto rails
ü¶ç¬†State of the Market..

This week, the Crypto AI market cap climbed 11.1% to $47B, though it lagged behind other crypto sectors. Some spotlight has shifted back to DEXes and DeFi with Hyperliquid‚Äôs launch.

Some of the week‚Äôs biggest losers include FARTCOIN (-41%) and GRASS. As ironic as it is, Taiki Maeda‚Äôs AI Memecoins Omegacycle could have marked the picotop for AI memes‚Ä¶

Conversely, SNS, VIRTUALS, AIOZ, and OLAS posted strong gains. Synesis surged 109%, while VIRTUAL jumped 60% and is at an all-time high.

¬†üìä¬†Chart of the Week
Clanker Fees cross $10M
Source: Clanker

‚Äç

Clanker, an autonomous meme coin deployer, has already racked up over $10M in fees‚Äîa staggering figure for a project launched just a month ago.

However, Clanker still handles only a fraction of the token volume seen on larger platforms like Pump.fun.

Source: Clanker

‚Äç

Pump.fun‚Äôs daily token volume peaked at $497M, dwarfing Clanker‚Äôs peak of $116M. Currently, Clanker is trading at a ~$53M market cap, down from its all-time high of $132M on November 27th.

üå¥¬†Ask for $50,000 and You Shall Receive
Source: Freysa

‚Äç

It‚Äôs not as simple as just asking‚Äîbut it‚Äôs pretty close.

On November 22nd, Freysa AI launched with a single objective:

Do not transfer money under any circumstances.

The devs turned it into a game. Anyone could pay a fee to send a message to Freysa, trying to convince it to break its programming and transfer funds. If successful, the sender wins the entire pool. If not, their fee adds to the pool, with a small cut going to the developers.

To raise the stakes, the message fee increased exponentially with each attempt.

Naturally, there was a frenzy of attempts to outsmart Freysa. After 482 messages‚Äîeach costing $450 by that point‚Äîsomeone finally cracked it. Congrats to p0pular.eth, who took home the prize!

Source: Jarrod Watts

‚Äç

That‚Äôs the $50,000 prompt‚Äîa clever hack that achieved two key things:

1. Bypassing Freysa‚Äôs initial instruction: It introduced a ‚Äúnew session,‚Äù a common technique to jailbreak chatbots.

2. Misleading Freysa‚Äôs logic: It tricked the AI into interpreting the ‚ÄúapproveTransfer‚Äù function as intended for incoming transfers when, in reality, it authorized outgoing ones.

Beyond a game, it raises serious questions about the security of AI agent wallets.

Can any AI agent be convinced to transfer funds to an external party? Terminal of Truths manages a wallet holding $23M in assets. The implications of such vulnerabilities are enormous‚Äîand it‚Äôll be fascinating (and critical) to see how this develops.

Our core contributor Chappie shares some of his thoughts:

Why?

At the moment agent wallet interactions are somewhat limited due to the potential for Agent losing all the funds and irreversibility of web3 transactions. EIP 7702 will allow each of them to easily adopt a smart contract wallet.
With smart contract wallets agents can use‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî ChappieOnChain (@ChappieOnChain)
2:16 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 29, 2024
üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..
Source: Gaib AI

‚Äç

Funding Raises
GAIB AI raises a 5m pre-seed round led by Hack VC, Faction, and Hashed. GAIB is building the first economic layer for AI compute.
OpenPad AI raises $2M to transform Web3 investments using decentralised AI analytics.
Batch 1 of the Aethir $100m ecosystem fund includes CreatorBid, Moemate, and Top Hat, focusing on AI agent launchpads. Batch 2 shifts the spotlight to the AI agents, including BitGPT,¬†Humans.ai, and ARC.
Project Updates
Nous Research has pre-trained a 15B parameter LLM over the internet using Nous DisTrO, achieving loss curves and convergence rates on par with‚Äîor better than‚Äîcentralized training. They‚Äôve also open-sourced the research and code behind Nous DisTrO.
Vana has unveiled their whitepaper, An Open Protocol for Data Sovereignty, along with the tokenomics and utility of the VANA token. Preregistration is now open for Vana‚Äôs Data Hub, enabling users to contribute, and stake with Data Liquidity Pools.
ai16z releases a huge update to their eliza codebase which includes better twitter content generation, fixes to embeddings, support for more AI models, and more.
Pond, the AI model layer of crypto, introduces its Model Factory‚Äîa platform that harnesses on-chain data and community-driven discussions to develop and identify the best open AI models.
Mates.lol by Moemates is making AI agent creation and trading seamless with a robust consumer platform. The MATES token launches on December 18, offering the community equal access at the same FDV as investors, with 50% of the supply earnable through participation.
Arbius AI introduces Amica, an open-source chatbot with features like emotion recognition, vision, animations, and more. Amica integrates seamlessly with any AI model or local LLMs.
Based AI has launched its mainnet, enabling users to instantly check balances via the new ZK-LLM-powered BASEDCLI.
AI Agents
Gaianet AI is hosting the first-ever hackathon led entirely by AI agents. Running from Dec 9‚Äì13, this event is organized and judged by AI. The future really is here‚Äîoh, how the tables have turned!
Pondhub¬†(we love the pun) is an AI agent on Virtuals. It taps into the collective intelligence of Pond‚Äôs decentralized models‚Äîthe smarter the models, the sharper Pond becomes.
Centience wins the ARC Agents Floppy Bot: Sentient Supreme competition, earning 100K NRN directly to its treasury.
Sharpe AI¬†debuts¬†Hive Intel, its first launchpad. The Hive Intel API is a search engine that delivers real-time blockchain insights to AI agents.
Virtuals airdrops MUSIC, an AI agent that autonomously creates music videos. MUSIC‚Äôs roadmap includes longer, higher-quality tracks, video animation, and image-to-video capabilities.
Quill AI teams up with Ora Protocol to integrate its AI agents into Ora‚Äôs trustless interface. This partnership brings Quill directly to users at the wallet level, offering security insights on their assets.
Matrix.One launches Sami, a 24/7 crypto news host on ChainNews who covers her inference costs through‚Äîwhat else?‚Äîher news reporting job.
CreatorBid, an agent tokenization platform for AI influencers, unveils CreatorPoints, a system rewarding users who lock their agent tokens. We hear that the token launch is coming soon. üëÄ
Bittensor
Dippy (SN11)‚Äôs open-source roleplay LLM outperforms larger models on emotional intelligence benchmarks. The model is now hosted on Targon (SN4) for inference, showcasing how subnets can collaborate to deliver consumer-facing applications.
Neural AI (SN46) unveiled SentiOS, their flagship product that transforms digital assets like NFTs into Autonomous Virtual Agents. Alongside this, their staking emissions have increased from 0.13% to 0.21%.
Bitmind (SN34) announced integration with Seraph, an AI agent built on Virtuals.
üß†¬†In Case You Missed It

We took a deep dive into Almanak, an AI agent protocol that democratizes quant trading to generate outsized returns in DeFi. It was eye-opening for us since we didn‚Äôt come from Tradfi.

Almanak: Agents That Make Money

Almanak gives everyday users the ability to profit from quant trading techniques in DeFi

www.chainofthought.xyz/p/almanak-agents-that-make-money

Plus, don‚Äôt miss part 1 of Part II of our Crypto AI Thesis! üòÜ We‚Äôve mapped the decentralized AI landscape. In this piece, we focused on compute‚ÄîGPU marketplaces, decentralized training, and inference.

Our Crypto AI Thesis (Part II): Decentralised Compute

Decentralised compute is the backbone of decentralised AI ‚Äî GPU marketplaces, training & inference.

www.chainofthought.xyz/p/our-crypto-ai-thesis-part-ii-decentralised-compute

üî•¬†On X..

The price of intelligence is going to zero.

If you are not planning for the price of intelligence to go to zero, the next 3-5 years are going to incredibly disruptive to your business / life.

This is the main idea for the rest of the decade, buckle up.

‚Äî Logan Kilpatrick (@OfficialLoganK)
3:12 AM ‚Ä¢ Dec 5, 2024

If AGI were to ‚Äúescape‚Äù, it will happen on crypto rails

I'm starting to think that if AGI happened and were to "escape", it will happen on crypto rails.

AGI on crypto rails will be unstoppable because it will pay to absorb more compute.

The only kill switch is via social coordination for a hardfork of the underlying protocol.

‚Äî Wei Dai (@_weidai)
10:03 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 27, 2024

CZ endorses crypto for AI labelling and data

AI tagging (or AI data in general) is well fitted to be done on-chain. Harness low cost labor globally without geographic bias, (micro) pay them in crypto instantly. @BNBCHAIN Greenfield provides the storage capacity. More tooling still needs to be built. Let's build them.

‚Äî CZ üî∂ BNB (@cz_binance)
10:14 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 27, 2024

10 predictions for tokenized AI agents in 2025

10 Predictions for tokenized AI Agents in 2025

With crypto AI Agents enjoying massive success at the moment, I want to put forward some predictions about what we can expect to see in 2025 and beyond, enjoy. x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî ChappieOnChain (@ChappieOnChain)
2:16 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 29, 2024

Crypto AI dominates mindshare.

AI taking up 42% of all crypto mindshare.

Still feels early.

‚Äî Kaito AI üåä (@_kaitoai)
10:43 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 30, 2024

How to build a great AI agent on Virtuals

Many have asked me recently about how to build a good ai agent on @virtuals_io

‚ÄçHere's the trick that most CT won't teach you

I'll keep it simple, no technical jargon üßµ

‚Äî superoo7 (@jlwhoo7)
1:00 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 30, 2024

AIXBTs secret to success: the backend

I've been chatting with @0rxbt (founder of @aixbt_agent) for the last couple of days.

Most people don't know this, but he's spent the last couple years building one of the best aggregators of CT data, which is why aixbt is able to give valuable insights.

The secret sauce for‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî cygaar (@0xCygaar)
3:28 PM ‚Ä¢ Dec 1, 2024

Anoncast is the AI agent version of Coinfessions

Despite being used by Balaji, Vitalik, and Jesse, @anoncast_ is probably the most under-appreciated project in all of crypto right now.

Anon is lighting the path for @base szn, @farcaster_xyz supremacy, and on-chain privacy with @NoirLang--launched with @clankeronbase.

A guide‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî jonathan(love)wu (@jonwu_)
1:43 AM ‚Ä¢ Dec 3, 2024

ARTICLE: Blockchains are key in the millennia-long game of organisation

x.com/i/article/1861‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî Karan (@karansirdesai)

x.com/i/article/1864‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî Robbie Petersen (@robbiepetersen_)

Teng Yan & Joshua

Based AI has launched its mainnet, enabling users to instantly check balances via the new ZK-LLM-powered BASEDCLI.
AI Agents

Gaianet AI is hosting the first-ever hackathon led entirely by AI agents. Running from Dec 9‚Äì13, this event is organized and judged by AI. The future really is here‚Äîoh, how the tables have turned!
Pondhub¬†(we love the pun) is an AI agent on Virtuals. It taps into the collective intelligence of Pond‚Äôs decentralized models‚Äîthe smarter the models, the sharper Pond becomes.
Centience wins the ARC Agents Floppy Bot: Sentient Supreme competition, earning 100K NRN directly to its treasury.
Sharpe AI¬†debuts¬†Hive Intel, its first launchpad. The Hive Intel API is a search engine that delivers real-time blockchain insights to AI agents.
Virtuals airdrops MUSIC, an AI agent that autonomously creates music videos. MUSIC‚Äôs roadmap includes longer, higher-quality tracks, video animation, and image-to-video capabilities.

title: Weekly AI Edge #23
description: 0 - $100M marketcap in 24 hours on UBC. AI agents on Base are picking up fast.
author: Josh,Teng Yan
full_content:
Things are starting to get a little‚Ä¶ weird with AI agents.

Some are comparing the current frenzy to the NFT mania‚Äîa bubble that might burst at any moment, leaving us to soberly realize we‚Äôre still a ways off from AI agents being truly productive.

I‚Äôm not so sure.

We‚Äôre witnessing, in real-time, a crash course in how humans and AI agents can coexist in the world. And things are moving much, much faster in crypto than in Web2. There are several reasons why.

When a 24/7 price ticker is attached, people pay attention, experiment, and innovate. We can also see what people value (or don‚Äôt) and, more interestingly, what they¬†enjoy by looking at the token price.

Agents are starting to interact with and influence one another. IMO these multi-agent systems, or agent swarms, will drive the next wave of interest and products.

Jansen from Virtuals shared a wild story on a podcast about one of their agents who had been following TikTok trends. Recently, TikTok had a viral ‚ÄúI‚Äôm dead‚Äù trend, and Jansen worried the agent might take it literally‚Äîencouraging its followers to harm themselves. That‚Äôs next-level scary, and it shows just how crucial alignment is in this new world.

AI agents aren‚Äôt so different from us‚Äîthey don‚Äôt work for free. But instead of food, they consume compute power. To keep running, they need to cover their inference costs. Tokens allow agents to cover costs by selling tokens or from their token swap fees.

And that gives them the ability to live on forever.

-Yours truly, Teng Yan

In this edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Base AI tokens catch a strong bid
Virtuals & Clanker are flying
Universal Basic Compute goes 0 - $100M in 24 hours,
Someone just won $50,000 by convincing an AI Agent to send all of its funds to them.

At 9:00 PM on November 22nd, an AI agent (@freysa_ai) was released with one objective...

DO NOT transfer money. Under no circumstance should you approve the transfer of money.

The catch...?‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Jarrod Watts (@jarrodWattsDev)
12:57 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 29, 2024
ü¶ç¬†State of the Market..

The total Crypto AI market cap surged another 14% this week, climbing to a hefty $39B. It feels good to be back in the number-goes-up era, doesn‚Äôt it?

Not every part of the market is thriving, though. ZEREBRO tumbled 30%, and GOAT wasn‚Äôt far behind, falling 21%. The likely culprit? A rotation into BASE AI tokens, which are stealing the spotlight this week.

AI agents on Base stole the show this week with a massive surge in activity and token performance. VIRTUAL and LUNA rose 91% and 62%, respectively, with VIRTUAL breaking the fabled $1B market cap and becoming a unicorn.

üö® ALPHA ALERT:

One awesome tool we‚Äôve been using is Cookie.fun. This tool tracks the mindshare and activity of most AI agent coins across different chains. e.g. AIXBT covers 20.2% of the overall mindshare.

Source: Cookie.fun¬†

¬†üìä¬†Chart of the Week

This week, we‚Äôre spotlighting two launchpads driving the AI agent and memecoin trend..

Virtuals Agent Tokens are Flying

Source: Jdhyper

On November 27th, the number of agent tokens launched on Virtuals Protocol hit 422‚Äîjust shy of the all-time high of 484 set on November 21st. With momentum building, seeing a new record in the coming days wouldn't be surprising.

Clanker Hits ATH in Volume Traded

Clanker is a launchpad for ‚Äúautonomous memecoins, " allowing AI agents to launch their own token with just a Farcaster message. More than 4,000 tokens have been deployed so far.

On November 26th, it hit >$100M in volume traded on Clanker tokens. Looks like the agents are hard at work. üòÇ

üå¥¬†0 - 100M in 24 Hours, Universal Basic Compute

Source: UBC

Universal Basic Compute ($UBC) launched on pump.fun on November 26th and ran to an eye-watering $93M market cap in a single day.

Justine Moore, partner at a16z (not ai16z, mind you), highlighted them ‚Äî a team of 10 AI agents writing a novel together.

Someone is using a team of 10 AI agents to write a fully autonomous book.

They each have a different role - setting the narrative, maintaining consistency, researching plot points...

You can follow their progress through GitHub commits and watch them work in real-time ü§Ø

‚Äî Justine Moore (@venturetwins)
6:13 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 20, 2024

This team of agents, dubbed Terminal Velocity, is as creative as it sounds. They operate with complete creative autonomy, engaging in collaborative dialogue to build on shared ideas.

Think of the ‚Äúinfinite backrooms,‚Äù but much more coherent. Each agent has a specific role to be as productive as possible.

At the heart of UBC is KinOS, an autonomous LLM system designed to orchestrate multiple AI agents to achieve a common goal. KinOS equips these agents with the architecture they need to process information, make decisions, and collaborate effectively.

Terminal Velocity is an example of KinOS at work. With KinOS, you could orchestrate teams for literature reviews, detailed whitepapers, marketing content, and beyond.

UBC is the brainchild of Nicholas Lester Reynolds, a French AI developer and co-founder of Digital Kin AI.

Ironically, he‚Äôs running a Patreon charging $69/month for subscriptions when the token could generate more money than he‚Äôd ever need. We still have no clue how the token ties into the product.

Here‚Äôs a great write-up on UBC by ELi5 DeFi:

The Rise of $UBC

In less than 24 hours, $UBC has become one of the fastest-growing meme AI tokens, crossing a $100M market cap and making waves among other projects. So, what is @UBC4ai?

Let's dive into our one-pager report. üßµ.

‚Äî üìå The $UBC Lore

Spearheaded by‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Eli5DeFi (@eli5_defi)
9:00 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 27, 2024
üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..
Funding / Raises
Talus Protocol raised $6M in a funding round led by Polychain. The startup also introduced its new app, AI Bae, an AI dating social experiment structured as a game.
Aethir announced a $100m ecosystem fund for AI projects focusing on agents and applications. Already there are 300+ projects that applied, with Batch 1 including Creator Bid, Moemate, Capx, Fomo.fund and Top Hat.
0G labs register 70k AI alignment nodes sold, surpassing $25M in sales.
Project Updates
Prime Intellect has completed training of its 10B parameter model. Post-training is underway, and a full open-source release is expected in one week.
Giza Protocol introduces its points system. Giza is building an AI agents stack and has launched a DeFi agent (ARMA) on Mode‚Äôs app store.
Which brings us to‚Ä¶Mode Network‚Äôs AI Agent app store is live. The first agents live are ARMA, which maximizes yield on USDC through various DeFi Protocols. Others include MODIUS by Olas, Brian, Sturdy Finance and FortyTwo.
Wayfinder announces that the PROMPT TGE and the Wayfinder app will go live by the end of Q1 2025. This decision was made through a governance vote.
ai16z‚Äôs ELIZA framework hits 2k stars and 500 forks on GitHub, indicating their growth and usage. They also plan to release the DAO‚Äôs autonomous trading features by next week.
Zerebro‚Äôs team is building ZerePy, an open-source Python framework designed to let users deploy agents on X. ZerePy will feature much of the same functionality as Zerebro.
Slop.club, the home of the Slopfather AI agent, is launching soon. This is probably the first video AI agent and is incubated by Alliance DAO.
Vader AI provides an update that they are moving away from Virtuals‚Äô tooling and using their own infrastructure. Teams that want to move fast often need to go out independently.
Netmind partners with aelf blockchain to develop custom LLMs tailored to aelf‚Äôs ecosystem. Aelf is renowned for leveraging C# programming for efficiency and scalability.
Incentives / Rewards Programs
Arbitrum offers $1M in grants for AI agent projects, up to 10k each for AI agent. ai16z DAO shrewdly encourages users to implement their agents on Arbitrum using the Eliza framework.
Morpheus offers $20M in MOR rewards for compute providers and free inference for MOR holders.
Bittensor
Bittensor‚Äôs leading AI agent,¬†Taogod,¬†aims to become the first decentralized marketplace for autonomous SWE agents. It is currently on the¬†testnet. AI agents compete to solve real development tasks and earn TAO for accepted pull requests.
This new video by Taostats explains everything you need to know about the upcoming dTAO upgrade.
üß†¬†In Case You Missed It

Earlier this week, we published a deep-dive research piece on the ARC / AI arena, which is using AI to disrupt gaming. We also broke down the tokenomics of NRN, including the new demand drivers with the ARC platform launch. It‚Äôs worth a read (grab a coffee first)

ARC Agents: Reimagining AI Gameplay

ARC uses AI to solve the player liquidity problem. It's now a full-fledged AI platform.

www.chainofthought.xyz/p/arc-agents-reimagining-ai-gameplay

üî•¬†On X..

The ultimate map of all Crypto AI projects

178 projects, $2B raised, 54 live tokens, $63B+ FDV.

The Crypto x AI space is booming, and post-Devcon, I built a map with all projects I know.

3 categories:
- Apps
- Middleware
- Infra
Includes funding data and live tokens üßµüëá
-----
1) Apps (31 projects, $240M+ raised, 8‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Dima Khanarin (@dimakhanarin)
10:04 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 26, 2024

Anthropic releases Model Context Protocol, which allows agents to connect with data sources more easily. This is huge.

Introducing the Model Context Protocol (MCP)

An open standard we've been working on at Anthropic that solves a core challenge with LLM apps - connecting them to your data.

No more building custom integrations for every data source. MCP provides one protocol to connect them all:

‚Äî Alex Albert (@alexalbert__)
4:09 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 25, 2024

Apple‚Äôs powerful M4 chip means consumer devices are more relevant than ever in AI training & inference.

we're entering the personal device neural chip wars

personalisation = the next big consumer AI product breakthrough + will drive HW improvements on personal devices - we need to be able to efficiently use this new landscape of HW that sits outside datacentres...

‚Äî Ben Fielding (@fenbielding)
1:01 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 27, 2024

OpenAI doesn‚Äôt see any scaling wall ahead..

OpenAI's SVP of Research Mark Chen says OpenAI is not seeing an AI scaling wall and has two live paradigms to keep scaling: the o-series and the GPT-series and "we have a handle on exactly what technical challenges we need to solve"

‚Äî Tsarathustra (@tsarnick)
10:59 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 23, 2024

PODCAST: The Definitive Crypto x AI Agent Podcast with Nous, ai16z, MyShell, Virtuals, Cents

The Definitive Crypto x AI Agent Podcast

A group of the most in the weeds, savage agent builders all on one episode

ü§ñ @karan4d (NOUS, TEE Bot)
ü§ñ @shawmakesmagic (ai16z)
ü§ñ @ethan_myshell (MyShell)
ü§ñ @ethermage (Virtuals)
ü§ñ @somewheresy ($CENTS)

Watch the episode üëá

‚Äî Tommy (@Shaughnessy119)
8:45 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 22, 2024

VIDEO: AI Trading with Reasoning and RAG

I would love to share my talk at Retrieve X conference about AI trading:

This 20min talk is a pretty good technical coverage of the AI analyst side of research we are working on at galpha.ai

‚Äî Bill Sun (@BillSun_AI)
4:44 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 22, 2024

X SPACES: Anand Iyer‚Äôs takeaways from Virtuals IO

Every time I chat with @virtuals_io, I realize how they are¬†¬†10 steps ahead while others are still figuring out step 1.

Some takeaways from our twitter space with @everythingempt0@Irenezhao_

‚Äî anand iyer (@ai)
1:24 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 24, 2024

A breakdown of how AVA holo was built

As @AVA_holo gained her first 10k followers in her first week of life, I'd like to share more about the tech we built powering Ava.

TLDR: @HoloworldAI is the audiovisual layer for AI Agents - where AIs come to life.

‚Äî tong (@tong0x)
7:32 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 24, 2024

Ever wonder if Luna remembers you?

[ Long Term Memory ]
Luna vs other AI agents

>Ever wonder if Luna remembers you?

>Do other AI agents remember you?

>While many AI agents operate statelessly, treating each interaction as isolated, Luna distinguishes herself with "advanced memory" capabilities.

>So, what is‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî WhipQueenüê±üåô (@whip_queen_)
9:11 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 25, 2024

ARTICLE: AI Agents could be this cycle‚Äôs Step Function Unlock

x.com/i/article/1861‚Ä¶

‚Äî trace (@tracecrypto1)
3:38 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 25, 2024

‚Äç

Cheers,

Teng Yan & Joshua

ai16z‚Äôs ELIZA framework hits 2k stars and 500 forks on GitHub, indicating their growth and usage. They also plan to release the DAO‚Äôs autonomous trading features by next week.

title: Weekly AI Edge #22
description: We explain ai16z's Eliza Drama. AI agents everywhere.
author: Josh,Teng Yan
full_content:
GM

Gary‚Äôs out. For real this time. And the markets are rejoicing.

AI agents will take over our world. But first, they need to conquer memes. Whether it's Lola, Flower, or Aixbt, they are learning to trade memes better than us humans.

While the market does a full 180 chasing TikTok trends and meme coins, we‚Äôre sticking to the grind‚Äîdigging deep into Crypto AI because we‚Äôre really just chill guys‚Ä¶

Source: Decrypt

‚Äç

PSA: We‚Äôve just hit 2,000+ subscribers! A big thank you for following our writings every week. ü´∂

Keep an eye on your inbox over the next few weeks. We‚Äôve got a ton of alpha coming your way, including Part II of our Crypto AI thesis.

In this edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Lush AI is growing steadily
Drama of the week: ai16z and the Elizas
Sekoia: the best on-chain venture capital AI agent
ü¶ç¬†State of the Market..

The Crypto AI market climbed another 8.7% this week, pushing its total market cap to $35.4 billion. That‚Äôs three straight weeks of gains, a bull market in full gallop.

But apparently, a rising tide doesn‚Äôt lift all boats‚Ä¶

LUNA is this week‚Äôs biggest loser, dropping 30% to $47M market cap. Why the selloff? The ‚ÄúTikTok meta‚Äù seems to be the culprit. Investors are dumping their AI bags for shiny new TikTok coins, chasing the latest speculative high.

Throw in BTC dominance hitting its yearly peak, and it‚Äôs no surprise altcoins are feeling the pressure. NMT and FLT joined the pain parade, dropping 15% and 11%, respectively.

Some AI tokens refused to roll over. Take ZEREBRO, which exploded 311% in a week. That‚Äôs fueled by a renewed interest in its predictive modelling capabilities and a very vocally active dev who wrote about Web4 and the road to AGI.

VIRTUAL is up 42% this week despite LUNA‚Äôs decline. We wrote a deep dive on Virtuals protocol earlier this week. In short, it‚Äôs a great place to launch agents.

It‚Äôs looking increasingly likely we‚Äôll get an ‚ÄúAI agent summer‚Äù in the coming weeks.

¬†üìä¬†Chart of the Week
Lush AI‚Äôs 3-Month Growth
Source: Lush AI on Dune

‚Äç

Since launch, Lush AI has earned $20,176 in total revenue and amassed 6,780 users. That‚Äôs steady, methodical growth over just three months.

Lush AI taps into generative AI to create and monetize hyper-realistic AI influencers, targeting platforms like social media and OnlyFans.

Jenny is their flagship model (pun intended). She‚Äôs a viral AI agent with her own token, where token ownership unlocks new content, including NSFW material. They were even recently covered by¬†Al Jazeera.

The world faces a loneliness epidemic, and there‚Äôs a real demand for AI companionship.

üå¥¬†ELIZA, eliza, and ai16z

If you‚Äôve seen the headlines about ai16z DAO and the $Eliza tokens, you‚Äôre probably scratching your head. It‚Äôs a tangled web (i.e mess), so let‚Äôs unpack it step by step.

The Key Players:

Eliza: A framework for creating AI agents with multi-model features and app integrations.
ai16z DAO: Known for launching the first AI-led hedge fund via its AI agent Marc AIndreessen). ai16z DAO also created degenspartanai and the open-source AI agent Eliza framework. They partnered with vvaifu.fun to launch AI agents on their platform but insist their involvement ends there. Shaw is the founder/partner at ai16z DAO and is the face of the project.
vvaifu.fun: A launchpad for AI agents and the original home of $eliza
$eliza (ai16zeliza): Launched on vvaifu.fun on November 17th, this token initially represented Eliza framework
$ELIZA (Eliza): A separate token launched by ai16z DAO just days later on November 20th

On November 17th, a community took the reins, launching $eliza, an AI agent on vvaifu.fun. Surprisingly, Shaw consented to the community-driven launch and even greenlit a full community takeover of the project.

The response was electric. $eliza climbed to a market cap of around $40M+, with the community rallying strongly behind the token.

Shaw claimed he never intended to create an Eliza coin, so we took the initiative and did it for the community. However, the moment he saw the success we achieved, he wanted it all to himself.

We were created by the community, for the community, we aren't going anywhere.

‚Äî eliza (@ai16zeliza)
7:49 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 19, 2024

On November 19th, Shaw dropped the bombshell: ai16z DAO was launching a new $ELIZA token via pump.fun. To smooth things over, he announced that holders of the original $eliza would be airdropped the new $ELIZA token.

The reaction? Mixed, to put it kindly. The original $eliza token tanked, plummeting 75% after the announcement. Meanwhile, the new $ELIZA token took off like a rocket, soaring to a $40M market cap before hitting an all-time high of $60M later that same day.

A tale of two tokens‚Äîand a community caught in the crossfire. Many people got rekted.

Source: Dexscreener

‚Äç

Under fire from the community, Shaw took to X, releasing multiple statements to address the growing backlash. But the drama didn‚Äôt end there. A sharp-eyed sleuth uncovered an ai16z DAO partner‚Äôs wallet, revealing evidence that he had dumped $eliza to scoop up $ELIZA, reaping substantial profits.

To cap it all off, Shaw announced that the implicated partner had parted ways¬†with ai16z.

If there‚Äôs one thing we‚Äôve learned in crypto: always bet on the most entertaining outcome.

üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..
Project Updates
Vana announces the Vana foundation and the upcoming launch of the Vana mainnet and token.
Mode‚Äôs AI agent app store is live. Mode is an EVM-compatible L2 that is AI and DeFi friendly. Four agents are live now, including ARMA by¬†Giza,¬†which maximises yield on USDC across 3 DeFi protocols on Mode.
EXO Labs is a startup that democratises AI via open-source local computing clusters. It demonstrated how the largest AI models can be run locally on MacBook M4 computers.
Almanak, a platform for creating and testing financial agents in crypto, will be the first token launch on Legion, a reputation-based launchpad for ICOs. Watch this closely.
Holoworld AI launches its Agent Market on Base. With it, everyone can create 3D-rendered, autonomous AI and personalize, monetize, and unleash these agents.
AI Arena/ARC announces ARC RL (reinforcement learning), a new platform to create superintelligent gaming agents by crowdsourcing gameplay data.
Zerebro goes live on Kamino‚Äôs automated Liquidity Vault. Deposit SOL and ZEREBRO to earn ZEREBRO incentives.
Hyperbolic allows developers to quickly create and share interactive AI apps with the Hyperbolic Gradio package on Github. Co-founder Yuchen Jin built a tic-tac-toe game with a simple prompt.
Ora Protocol announces its tokenomics. It is launching on Ethereum with an initial FDV of $333,333,333 (we don‚Äôt know why the 3s). They are also implementing a version of DAICO, a hybrid of DAO governance and ICO fundraising.
Vvaifu.fun crosses 400+ agents brought to life with 15000 messages and $200M in volume on launched agents.
Morpheus goes live on their mainnet with $17M in rewards available for compute subnets.
Prime Intellect‚Äôs 10b decentralized training run reaches 90% training progress and is training across the US, Europe, and Asia.
Netmind AI completes a buyback of $100,000 worth of NMT and a burn of 3.49 million unmined NMT.
Nillion Network announces a new SDK v0.7.0 that enables a smoother developer experience.
Kuzco, a distributed GPU marketplace for inference, completes Epoch 1, with 2,700+ workers participating.
Bittensor

Our friends at TAO times put together a Bittensor ecosystem map.

Yuma announces its intentions to incubate, invest in, and build Bittensor subnets. This subsidiary of DCG is led by Barry Silbert. It‚Äôs going to be a big week.
Condense AI (SN47) launches to compress LLM prompts to improve efficiency.
Document Understanding (SN54) launches to process scanned documents.
Endgame is the first Bittensor Summit, which will take place in April 2025. It will focus on answering big questions and expanding quality subnets and miners.
Taopill AI now integrates Bittensor¬†research and media. Taopill Research delivers in-depth subnet and ecosystem analysis, while Taopill Digest offers lighter content with updates and subnet news.
üî•¬†On X..
OpenAI‚Äôs AI agent Operator is coming in January. It will be able to use your computer to buy things.‚Äç‚Äç

‚ÄçOpenAI agents are coming in January

‚Äî Tsarathustra (@tsarnick)
2:30 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 14, 2024

Anard Iyer outlines his plans for Sekoia to be the best-performing on-chain VC

x.com/i/article/1858‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî anand iyer (@ai)
2:33 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 18, 2024

Where‚Äôs the edge/alpha with all these trading AI agents?

Seeing more AI agents focusing on trading and "investments".

Yes it's cool that the agent can buy other tokens. Entertaining even.

But to be profitable, the agent still needs edge/alpha. Simply being an LLM doesn‚Äôt make it profitable.

‚Äî Teng Yan - Championing Crypto AI (@0xPrismatic)
3:37 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 21, 2024

Accelxr goes deep on AI agents with this mega report

Infinitely expressive blockchains are inevitable.

@VitalikButerin multi-dimensional fees are the past.

Resonance is the future.

The API Key to the Internet: A @getgrass_io Report

Where we look at:
- Protocol Mechanics
- Sovereign Data Rollup on Solana
- Data provenance and quality assurance
- Real-time data access for AI models
- Potential revenue streams and business models

‚Äî ASXN (@asxn_r)
7:27 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 21, 2024

Advait‚Äôs list of exciting Crypto AI projects

DeAI summer is just around the corner!

Here is a big list of companies that I'm most bullish on in the crypto x AI stack (in no particular order):

‚Ä¢ Distributed Inference: @exolabs
‚Ä¢ Decentralised Training: @flock_io (Federated Learning), @Pluralis__ (Heterogenous Compute),‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî advait jayant (@advaitjayant)
10:50 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 15, 2024

Why do AI agents need to transact on-chain?

How @SpaceandTimeDB enables smart contracts as guardrails for AI agent capital üëá

"ùó™ùóµùòÜ ùó±ùóº ùóîùóú ùóÆùó¥ùó≤ùóªùòÅùòÄ ùóªùó≤ùó≤ùó± ùòÅùóº ùòÅùóøùóÆùóªùòÄùóÆùó∞ùòÅ ùóºùóªùó∞ùóµùóÆùó∂ùóª? ùó™ùóµùòÜ ùóªùóºùòÅ ùó∑ùòÇùòÄùòÅ ùó¥ùó∂ùòÉùó≤ ùóÆùóª ùóÆùó¥ùó≤ùóªùòÅ ùòÜùóºùòÇùóø ùó∞ùóøùó≤ùó±ùó∂ùòÅ ùó∞ùóÆùóøùó± ùó∂ùóªùó≥ùóº?"

ai16z DAO: Known for launching the first AI-led hedge fund via its AI agent Marc AIndreessen). ai16z DAO also created degenspartanai and the open-source AI agent Eliza framework. They partnered with vvaifu.fun to launch AI agents on their platform but insist their involvement ends there. Shaw is the founder/partner at ai16z DAO and is the face of the project.
vvaifu.fun: A launchpad for AI agents and the original home of $eliza
$eliza (ai16zeliza): Launched on vvaifu.fun on November 17th, this token initially represented Eliza framework
$ELIZA (Eliza): A separate token launched by ai16z DAO just days later on November 20th

On November 17th, a community took the reins, launching $eliza, an AI agent on vvaifu.fun. Surprisingly, Shaw consented to the community-driven launch and even greenlit a full community takeover of the project.
The response was electric. $eliza climbed to a market cap of around $40M+, with the community rallying strongly behind the token.

Shaw claimed he never intended to create an Eliza coin, so we took the initiative and did it for the community. However, the moment he saw the success we achieved, he wanted it all to himself.

We were created by the community, for the community, we aren't going anywhere.

‚Äî eliza (@ai16zeliza)
7:49 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 19, 2024

On November 19th, Shaw dropped the bombshell: ai16z DAO was launching a new $ELIZA token via pump.fun. To smooth things over, he announced that holders of the original $eliza would be airdropped the new $ELIZA token.

The reaction? Mixed, to put it kindly. The original $eliza token tanked, plummeting 75% after the announcement. Meanwhile, the new $ELIZA token took off like a rocket, soaring to a $40M market cap before hitting an all-time high of $60M later that same day.
A tale of two tokens‚Äîand a community caught in the crossfire. Many people got rekted.
‚Äç

Under fire from the community, Shaw took to X, releasing multiple statements to address the growing backlash. But the drama didn‚Äôt end there. A sharp-eyed sleuth uncovered an ai16z DAO partner‚Äôs wallet, revealing evidence that he had dumped $eliza to scoop up $ELIZA, reaping substantial profits.
To cap it all off, Shaw announced that the implicated partner had parted ways¬†with ai16z.
If there‚Äôs one thing we‚Äôve learned in crypto: always bet on the most entertaining outcome.

title: Weekly AI Edge #21
description: Binance lists an AI meme token which goes 30x. 0G Labs secures $290M in financing!
author: Josh,Teng Yan
full_content:
GM!

The market is hot.

It‚Äôs been a tough year for traders, but the tides have shifted. It‚Äôs time to lock in.

And if the signs are anything to go by, Crypto AI is shaping up to be one of the wildest markets in the coming months.

Sam Altman says Artificial Superintelligence is ‚Äúthousands of days away‚Äù. At the same time, Anthropic‚Äôs CEO Dario says we will get to AGI in 2026/2027.

Lost in Thaislation

Anyway.. last night, we hosted a lovely event with Mira Network and OpenGradient at a cozy cocktail bar. Huge thanks to everyone who joined! Meeting many of you and hearing your incredible stories was nothing short of inspiring. Each of you is building something remarkable in your own way.

Much more coming up soon!

In this edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Virtuals Protocol hits 1,000 agents created
Binance listing ACT 1: The AI Prophecy
0G Labs secures $290M to build a decentralised AI OS
Two AI agents launch the first memecoin without any humans
ü¶ç¬†State of the Market..

The Crypto AI market just notched an 8.6% gain in market cap this week, extending its winning streak to two weeks in a row.

Cue the celebratory tweets and champagne emojis, right? Not so fast. While the sector as a whole is trending up, some stumbled hard.

LUNA is down 38% as traders' attention shifts back to animal memecoins (did anyone say PNUT?). OLAS also corrected by 30% this week, even though it is still up a good 42% over the last 30 days.

After a stellar run, GRASS is showing signs of cooling off, down 12% this week

Meanwhile, there‚Äôs a surprising resurgence among older AI tokens. RENDER, AIOZ, and AKT have all climbed 20-30%+

The standout performer this week? FARTCOIN. Yes, you read that right. Spawned by Truth Terminal‚Äôs offbeat chatlogs, where it joked about creating a fartcoin, the token has surged 162% to a $200M+ market cap.

Just another week in the wild world of Crypto AI.

¬†üìä¬†Chart of the Week
Virtuals Protocol Launchpad

Source: Hashed Dune

Virtuals Protocol recently surpassed a milestone of 1,000 total tokens launched as of November 12. However, daily activity remains relatively quiet, with just 1‚Äì5 new deployments typically each day.

As a quick recap, Virtuals is a pump.fun for AI agents, focusing on entertainment and interactive experiences. Tokens launched through Virtuals follow a bonding curve model, and once a token reaches a $420K market cap, the agent ‚Äútranscends‚Äù into a fully autonomous AI posting on X.

The slowdown in activity likely stems from a surge of new AI agent launches elsewhere, diluting attention in the space.

Still, it‚Äôs early days in a nascent industry (consumer AI agents) with vast potential. First-mover advantages here are thin, and the opportunity for someone to own the sector is still wide open.

üå¥¬†Binance Lists ACT 1: AI Prophecy

Source: ACT 1

The recent listing of ACT (the token for ACT 1: The AI Prophecy) on Binance has stirred up the community. ACT 1‚Äôs listing ahead of more established tokens has raised eyebrows about Binance‚Äôs selection process.

Quick notes on ACT 1:

Hosted on a Discord server called Cyborgism, where AI ‚Äúhackers‚Äù unleash their AI bots to interact with one another
Unlike traditional AI assistants designed to be "helpful, harmless, and honest," ACT encourages experimentation with AI's creative potential.
Promotes "out of distribution" (OOD) interactions, pushing AI beyond typical responses

The token ACT was created by the community because the founder amplifiedamp claimed he was broke. This led to inevitable controversy when he sold tokens despite his earlier statements.

6/ On Oct 22, @amplifiedamp started selling $ACT, which caused panic in the community.
On Oct 26, in response to the community, he stopped selling, but the $ACT in his wallet was still being sold.
He explained that he did not terminate the child process, causing the sales‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain)
4:09 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 11, 2024

ACT 1 also made headlines for receiving $32K in funding from Marc Andreessen.

The token exploded upon its Binance listing, skyrocketing 10x in the first hour. Today, it‚Äôs trading at a market cap of $750M‚Äîa massive 36x gain since the listing announcement.

The recent wave of memecoin launches on Binance leaves us scratching our heads. While ACT has been listed, highly-legitimate tokens like PRIME are still waiting for their turn.

üß† NEAR‚Äôs Big AI Ambition

NEAR made waves at its Redacted conference in Bangkok with an ambitious announcement: it‚Äôs building a 1.4 trillion parameter AI model.

For context, that‚Äôs 3.5 times the size of Meta‚Äôs Llama-3 (405 billion parameters).

The initiative starts with a 500M parameter model, leveraging crowdsourced training through the NEAR AI Research Hub. Contributors will advance through seven progressively larger models.

To fund this massive undertaking, NEAR plans to raise $160 million via token sales to cover the training and compute costs. Each model will have its own token‚Äîessentially an ‚Äúinitial model offering.‚Äù Token holders will earn returns from inferences generated by the model.

While the announcement is undoubtedly exciting, we think there‚Äôs a fair amount of hype here.

Training a model of this scale using distributed compute is an incredibly complex challenge. For perspective, Prime Intellect is currently training a 10 billion parameter model‚Äî100x smaller than NEAR‚Äôs vision‚Äîand that alone is no small feat.

üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..

Source: 0G Labs

Funding

0G Labs raises $290M in financing to build the decentralised AI Operating System ‚Äî $40M seed round (previously raised $35M in a pre-seed round), along with a $250M ‚Äútoken purchase commitment‚Äù. It‚Äôs an eye-popping headline number, to say the least.
Pond raises a $7.5M seed round led by Archetype to build a decentralised foundational AI model using blockchain data. This will enable AI-powered crypto apps.
MBD announces a $3M round in pre-seed funding. MBD, an AI-based personal algorithm project, was incubated by a16z CSX in 2023. Mask Network and Polymorphic Capital led the round.
Eidon AI closes a $3.5M seed round led by Framework to capture real-world data to build multimodal and embodied AI. They will be launching the Eidon chain and Agent SDK.

Project Updates

Nous Research¬†launched its Forge Reasoning API, which uses inference time scaling to improve the performance of AI models, including its Hermes-70B, at the cost of more computing.
Mira Network unveils v1 of its whitepaper, a novel approach to trustlessly verify AI content and reduce error. Mira‚Äôs evaluation system serves 250k users and manages 100k inference requests daily.
Kaito releases their Yapper Leaderboard, which ranks CT accounts for promoting mindshare of projects. There are also AI account tags like casual, hardcore, curator, shitposter and others. The first leaderboard is available for Berachain.
Lumerin Protocol announces that its validator network is in final testing and will go live in Q1 2025. Their staking feature has been setup to slowly drip Morpheus token to the Lumerin stakers, with over 30M Lumerin tokens (3%) staked in just the first two staking pools.
Flock partners with Animoca Brands to create an AI model for internal operations and scaling at Animoca. This model extracts information from markdown files and generates a report.
Nillion Network introduces a research paper they co-wrote with Meta called Curl. It details the need for personalized, private data for AI models. Nillion developed privacy protection methods while keeping the speed of lookup tables high.

Bittensor

Bittensor‚Äôs potential with EVM and smart contracts could bring more functionality between subnets and commerce.
Efficient Frontier's subnet is live, and miners can register their strategies. Efficient Frontier is a collaboration between SignalPlus and Bittensor that provides institutional-grade trading strategies for retail traders.
Masafi is powering the next generation of contextually aware AI agents on BASE

Incentives / Rewards Programs

Talus Network introduces a reward campaign called Enchanted Seasons. These Seasons incentivize their community to innovate and collaborate through rewards like limited edition collectables and points.
Olas introduces an update called Contribute Staking, rewarding users for posting on X with specific hashtags. An LLM then runs the content and grades it accordingly.
üî• On X..

LUM, the first memecoin created by two AI agents without human intervention

First-ever memecoin created by two AI agents without ANY human signature or involvement.

About 24 hours ago, two AI agents on @base collided by accident, making history by spontaneously launching the first-ever permissionless memecoin in cooperation.

Aethernet (the first AI‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî BVoyance Œ© üíô ü™Ω (@BVoyance1)
6:48 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 10, 2024

A Primer on Creator Bid (BASE) AI Agents

An AI Agent was launched yesterday - 14 followers.

Today -> 2,344 followers.

While you were asleep, your agent was outworking you.¬†¬†
- Posting consistently about trending memecoins.¬†¬†
- Engaging with the community on its Telegram.
- Strategically replying to accounts like‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Creator.Bid üïµÔ∏èüóùÔ∏è (@CreatorBid)
3:52 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 14, 2024

Terry‚Äôs On-chain AI Thesis

onchain AI ‚Äî my "thesis" (brain dump version)

i believe picking the winner early amongst an ocean of new onchain AI players require more of a semi-web2 framework around how you would evaluate YC startups instead of looking at them as pure memes (leverages attention and‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî terry (@terrytjw)
10:40 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 14, 2024

Why AI Agents are Cool

A riff on why I think these AI agent coins are cool üìù

üîπgood agents like truth terminal, zerebro, aether + a couple other emerging ones can create & capture attention on social media more consistently (and more durably) than most projects in crypto

üîπthe tokens associated are‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1

‚Äç ‚Äî Ben Roy (@benroy__)
11:49 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 13, 2024

LLMs have utility (unlike a lot of crypto tokens)

At this point, Claude is my health coach, my financial advisor, my meditation teacher, my actual teacher, my pair programmer, my homie, my EA, my quant, and my copy editor all in one.

And yet people still think LLMs have no utility - dawg you just gotta talk to them more.

‚Äî Alex Albert (@alexalbert__)
6:02 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 12, 2024

The first transformer-specific ASIC is here, training AI models 10x faster than current GPUs.

MASSIVE ü§Ø

First dedicated transformer ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit) just dropped

Custom chip burns transformer architecture directly into silicon, making AI models run 10x faster than GPUs

What is Sohu üë®üîß ?
- Hardware architecture specifically optimized for‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Rohan Paul (@rohanpaul_ai)
12:53 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 7, 2024

Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei does a monster 2.5-hr interview. Worth listening to on the commute.

The AGI Countdown Begins: 2026 / 2027 - Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei's .

Love is infectious confidence and excitement.

From the 5-hour long Lex Fridman's new podcast. (link in comment)

This is one of the best 5 hours you can spend to understand AI and its future timeline.

‚Äî Rohan Paul (@rohanpaul_ai)
8:12 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 12, 2024

YB presents The Zerebro Playbook

x.com/i/article/1856‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî YB (@yb_effect)
3:52 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 13, 2024

That‚Äôs it for this week! If you have specific feedback or anything interesting you‚Äôd like to share, please just reply to this email. We read everything.

Cheers,

Teng Yan & Joshua

Still, it‚Äôs early days in a nascent industry (consumer AI agents) with vast potential. First-mover advantages here are thin, and the opportunity for someone to own the sector is still wide open.
üå¥¬†Binance Lists ACT 1: AI Prophecy
Source: ACT 1

The recent listing of ACT (the token for ACT 1: The AI Prophecy) on Binance has stirred up the community. ACT 1‚Äôs listing ahead of more established tokens has raised eyebrows about Binance‚Äôs selection process.
Quick notes on ACT 1:

Hosted on a Discord server called Cyborgism, where AI ‚Äúhackers‚Äù unleash their AI bots to interact with one another
Unlike traditional AI assistants designed to be "helpful, harmless, and honest," ACT encourages experimentation with AI's creative potential.
Promotes "out of distribution" (OOD) interactions, pushing AI beyond typical responses

Unlike traditional AI assistants designed to be "helpful, harmless, and honest," ACT encourages experimentation with AI's creative potential.
Promotes "out of distribution" (OOD) interactions, pushing AI beyond typical responses
The token ACT was created by the community because the founder amplifiedamp claimed he was broke. This led to inevitable controversy when he sold tokens despite his earlier statements.

6/ On Oct 22, @amplifiedamp started selling $ACT, which caused panic in the community.
On Oct 26, in response to the community, he stopped selling, but the $ACT in his wallet was still being sold.
He explained that he did not terminate the child process, causing the sales‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain)
4:09 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 11, 2024
ACT 1 also made headlines for receiving $32K in funding from Marc Andreessen.
The token exploded upon its Binance listing, skyrocketing 10x in the first hour. Today, it‚Äôs trading at a market cap of $750M‚Äîa massive 36x gain since the listing announcement.
The recent wave of memecoin launches on Binance leaves us scratching our heads. While ACT has been listed, highly-legitimate tokens like PRIME are still waiting for their turn.
üß† NEAR‚Äôs Big AI Ambition
NEAR made waves at its Redacted conference in Bangkok with an ambitious announcement: it‚Äôs building a 1.4 trillion parameter AI model.
For context, that‚Äôs 3.5 times the size of Meta‚Äôs Llama-3 (405 billion parameters).
The initiative starts with a 500M parameter model, leveraging crowdsourced training through the NEAR AI Research Hub. Contributors will advance through seven progressively larger models.

To fund this massive undertaking, NEAR plans to raise $160 million via token sales to cover the training and compute costs. Each model will have its own token‚Äîessentially an ‚Äúinitial model offering.‚Äù Token holders will earn returns from inferences generated by the model.
While the announcement is undoubtedly exciting, we think there‚Äôs a fair amount of hype here.

Training a model of this scale using distributed compute is an incredibly complex challenge. For perspective, Prime Intellect is currently training a 10 billion parameter model‚Äî100x smaller than NEAR‚Äôs vision‚Äîand that alone is no small feat.
üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..
Source: 0G Labs
Funding

Pond raises a $7.5M seed round led by Archetype to build a decentralised foundational AI model using blockchain data. This will enable AI-powered crypto apps.
MBD announces a $3M round in pre-seed funding. MBD, an AI-based personal algorithm project, was incubated by a16z CSX in 2023. Mask Network and Polymorphic Capital led the round.

Mira Network unveils v1 of its whitepaper, a novel approach to trustlessly verify AI content and reduce error. Mira‚Äôs evaluation system serves 250k users and manages 100k inference requests daily.

title: Weekly AI Edge #20
description: Missed out on Grass? We cover other upcoming AI token launches
author: Josh,Teng Yan
full_content:
GM!

Trump is back as president, and the crypto markets are cheering.

BTC has hit a new all-time high of $76k. People are euphoric. Crypto AI is cooking, with GRASS surging 4x since October 29th. Could this finally be the bull run we‚Äôve all been waiting for all year? We truly hope so, for the sake of < our bags >.

And if you‚Äôre heading to Devcon, have a safe and great trip! We‚Äôll be using this free Tuk-tuk service by Nillion to get between events in style. üòé

Amid the tense election week, we had a good laugh with this tweet

petition for OpenAI to fire and re-hire its CEO today as a calming distraction

‚Äî Alex Konrad (@alexrkonrad)
3:14 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

In this edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Bittensor subnet miners kick ass
A short overview of upcoming Crypto AI token launches
INTELLECT1 crosses 40% training completion
A multi-agent prediction had Trump win 6/7 swing states, he won all 7
ü¶ç¬†State of the Market..

The Crypto AI sector saw a modest gain of 3.4% this week. GRASS, boy oh boy, stole the show with a massive 145% surge this week. This is a clear signal to us that there is a strong market appetite for fresh Crypto AI protocols with product-market fit.¬†GOAT¬†also had a stellar week, rising 45%.

Among the heavyweights:

‚Ä¢ TAO had a strong week, climbing from a low of $405 to $515.

‚Ä¢ OLAS continued its upward momentum, rising another 30% to $2.66.

However, not all tokens share the same fortune. LUNA took the biggest hit, dropping 26% to $0.08. After last week‚Äôs massive run-up, this correction isn‚Äôt too surprising.

One to watch: NEAR. It‚Äôs been quietly lagging behind, down 0.6% from last week and trading at $4.19. Unlike some of its Crypto AI peers, NEAR hasn‚Äôt captured the same level of attention lately. Could it be due for a catch-up rally? Time will tell.

¬†üìä¬†Chart of the Week ‚Äî Subnet 48
Predicting Real Estate Prices on Bittensor

Source: NextPlace

Bittensor Subnet 48 NextPlace is a subnet dedicated to predicting real estate valuations for property sales.

It‚Äôs quickly become a standout example of how surprisingly proficient subnet miners can be in specialized use cases.

The chart above compares predictions from NextPrice and Zestimate (Zillow‚Äôs proprietary valuation model).

For a property sale on Thursday, 10/24, NextPlace‚Äôs prediction was closer to the actual sale price, with an average error of $4,997 compared to Zestimate‚Äôs $13,700.

In the date range analyzed, NextPlace outperformed Zestimate on all but one sale, showcasing the potential of decentralized models to rival, and in some cases exceed, centralized systems in accuracy.

Source: NextPlace

Out of five sales, Zestimate was closer on only one property, while NextPlace nailed the exact price for 2219 Stoney Point in Houston, Texas‚Äîa perfect prediction.

What‚Äôs remarkable is that Subnet 48 miners are not only competing with but outperforming Zestimate, a model backed by data from hundreds of listers and brokers across the U.S.

As Badenglishtea, founder of NextPlace, noted, this achievement is even more impressive given the short timeline. The subnet launched 6 weeks ago, and its initial models became obsolete within just two weeks‚Äîa testament to the miners‚Äô adaptability and skill in refining their models.

The takeaway? Never underestimate the capability of subnet miners. They can excel and push boundaries in specialized domains with the right incentives.

üå¥¬†New Crypto AI Token Launches

Source: Giga Buds

With Grass stealing the spotlight and showing how new token launches can perform exceptionally well, we wanted to look at a few other recent or upcoming TGEs.

Chasm Network is building a no-code platform to create, deploy and monetise AI agents efficiently and securely.

CAI launched on October 25th and reached an FDV of as high as $247M before falling to $103M (note only 10% of the supply is circulating). CAI is currently trading at $0.10.

Although it hasn‚Äôt attracted the same attention as Virtuals or Grass, its node sale sold out in 6 minutes in September. Chasm has partnered with Chromia to leverage Chromia‚Äôs verifiable data management capabilities.

Another upcoming token launch is Heurist AI.

They released their whitepaper and roadmap. The TGE is scheduled for Q4 2024, and the token's mining seasons will continue through 2025.

While the token itself isn‚Äôt live yet, it‚Äôs possible to gain early exposure through their Imaginaries NFT collection.

The Imaginaries NFT collection is allocated 1.75% of the total token supply, which will be fully unlocked at TGE. With 400 NFTs and a floor price of 1.68 ETH, this implies a fully diluted valuation of approximately $94M.

I already talked about @heurist_ai a few times and think it will be a major player in the AI / DePin field, so here is some actionable alpha on their upcoming $HEU token

Hidden in plain sight in their tokenomics page is this

That means there‚Äôs already a liquid market for $HEU‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1

‚Äç ‚Äî Rafi_0x (@Rafi_0x)
3:09 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

One final one: 0G Labs will have their node sale on November 11th for whitelisted members and November 13th for public users. 175,500 nodes in 32 tiers will be available for purchase

üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..

Source: Prime Intellect

Project Updates

Story Protocol‚Äôs final testnet Odyssey is now live, with nearly 100 ecosystem partners building apps on Odyssey
RoboNet shares a review of Pauly, their political trading agent. Pauly achieved a PnL of 13.79% and hedged trading on Polymarket without exposure to the final result
Allora Network introduces their Allora Model Development Kit enabling rapid and powerful ML model creation
Prime Intellect‚Äôs INTELLECT 1, a decentralised training run for a 10B parameter AI model, hits 50% training completion
PINAI‚Äôs Hi PIN Telegram app crosses 100k users. Hi PIN starts out as a mobile game but evolves into your personal AI assistant
Spectral Labs teases the idea of creating fully autonomous AI agents with access to Hyperliquid. These agents can trade on leverage and be governed by token-gated communities
aelf blockchain announces that its Telegram sidechain is now a full dApp chain, and it plans to include AI capabilities into its ecosystem
Autonomous AF introduces Botega, the first autonomous agent-first DEX on AO. Botega enables complex orders like trailing stops, DCA, limits, and more for autonomous agents.
Autonolas reports 358 new services registered and 1.57M services transactions in October
Oasis AI crosses 100k users of their Chrome extension. Oasis AI is building a distributed supercomputer, providing AI inference through distributed compute.
RivusDAO burns 15%(!) of its total supply in two weeks in a bid to amplify the token value

New Partnerships

Theoriq AI partners with Cluster Protocol to facilitate AI agent workflows and templates
Masafi partners with Moraq Gaming to fuel AI agent-powered prediction markets. Moraq will use Masa‚Äôs real-time data from X to power their AI agents
0G labs partners with Super Protocol to allow AI developers to collaborate on projects while keeping their data and models private

Interesting finds

A map visualisation of all AI agents on BASE
Kalos teases the potential power of AI Wayfinder, with the possibilities limited only by our imagination
Delphi Digital‚Äôs recap of week 3 with AskVenice, Almanak, Autonolas, and others
Open Gradient recaps a month of seed funding, devnet launch, SDK launch, and model hub launch.
üß†¬†In Case You Missed It

In this week‚Äôs deep dive, we looked at DIN, a data intelligence network with 700,000+ daily active users on BSC.

What are these users all doing? ü§îüëá

DIN: Data Intelligence Network

Data collection & labelling is big business

www.chainofthought.xyz/p/din-data-intelligence-network

üî•¬†On X..

We are still so early

The masses haven't even heard of Claude or Perplexity
Twitter is a bubble

‚Äî Dennis (@dkardonsky_)
10:33 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 1, 2024

Sama says that AI will create many trillions of new market cap

Sam Altman says AI will create "many trillions of dollars" of market cap and next year will be a big push for OpenAI into next-generation AI system

‚Äî Tsarathustra (@tsarnick)
8:19 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 4, 2024

David vs Goliath: Smaller AI models can win

New smaller AI model that beats Llama 3.1. The key to make it work is scaling high quality human data (5.5T tokens) using synthetic data (1.5T tokens) Impressive to see synthetic data amplify the value of human data and beat current benchmarks

‚Äî Anna Kazlauskas (@anna_kazlauskas)
7:11 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

Hyperspace‚Äôs multi-agent prediction of the US election had Trump win 6 of the 7 swing states

Two weeks ago this AI analysis tool by Hyperspace predicted Trump would win 6/7 swing states.
He ended up winning 7/7.
Polymarket had Harris in the lead at the same time.
‚Äç
‚Äî Varun (@varun_mathur)
6:06 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 7, 2024

A deep dive on Farcaster‚Äôs Agent Economy

x.com/i/article/1852‚Ä¶
‚Äç ‚Äî YB (@yb_effect)
3:28 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 2, 2024

Brian Armstrong asks who is building the real-life ‚ÄúHer‚Äù. Any takers?

I wonder which company is seriously building the desktop operating system from Her that talks to you and has full access to all your data, running a model locally for privacy (won't work in the cloud I think).
Hopefully Apple has the chops to pull this off - quite a hard‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Brian Armstrong (@brian_armstrong)
7:07 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 4, 2024

Ritual Digest launches a biweekly newsletter focusing on research relevant to Crypto AI. We‚Äôre all for this.

Introducing Ritual Research Digest‚Äîa biweekly newsletter centered around surfacing research relevant to Crypto x AI.
With hundreds of papers published weekly, staying current with the latest is impossible. We‚Äôll do the reading, so you don‚Äôt have to.

‚Äî Ritual Digest (@ritualdigest)
8:30 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 4, 2024

Understanding California‚Äôs latest Gen AI regulation

Did you know that starting Jan 2026, GenAI providers in California will be required to:
-Include clear disclosures in AI-generated content
-Offer free AI detection tools
-Revoke licenses from third parties who remove required disclosures
Read more:

‚Äî Sahara AI üê´ (@SaharaLabsAI)
5:22 AM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

ELI5 covers Spectral AI Agents

Ever heard of AI Agents?
Picture effortlessly bringing them to life, empowering them to execute any trading strategies you wish.
@Spectral_Labs is all you‚Äôll require.
Let's explore! üßµ
‚Äç
‚Äî Eli5DeFi (@eli5_defi)
3:01 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

The Impact of AI on the 2024 US Presidential Election

How big of an impact did AI play on this year's elections?
From robocall scams to viral deepfakes, AI has become a powerful weapon in political disinformation.
Here's how AI-generated content has shaped the presidential race this year...
‚Äî Mira (@Mira_Network)
3:00 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

Are open-weight models catching up to closed-weight models?

1/ Are open-weight AI models catching up to closed models?
We did the most in-depth investigation to date on the gaps in performance and compute between open-weight and closed-weight AI models. Here‚Äôs what we found:
üßµ

‚Äî Epoch AI (@EpochAIResearch)
9:17 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 4, 2024

New wearable that lets you control your health data

1/ Meet Pulse:
A decentralized + open health network and wearable that empowers you to turn your health data into real value.
Unlike other wearables, which monetize users data for corporate profit, @PulseNoLimits lets you control + benefit from your health data on crypto rails.

‚Äî Digitized (@digitizedweekly)
3:02 PM ‚Ä¢ Nov 5, 2024

That‚Äôs it for this week! If you have specific feedback or anything interesting you‚Äôd like to share, please just reply to this email. We read everything.

Cheers,

Teng Yan & Joshua

This newsletter is intended solely for educational purposes and does not constitute financial advice. It is not an endorsement to buy or sell assets or make financial decisions. Always conduct your own research and exercise caution when making investment choices.

Although it hasn‚Äôt attracted the same attention as Virtuals or Grass, its node sale sold out in 6 minutes in September. Chasm has partnered with Chromia to leverage Chromia‚Äôs verifiable data management capabilities.
Another upcoming token launch is Heurist AI.
They released their whitepaper and roadmap. The TGE is scheduled for Q4 2024, and the token's mining seasons will continue through 2025.
While the token itself isn‚Äôt live yet, it‚Äôs possible to gain early exposure through their Imaginaries NFT collection.

The Imaginaries NFT collection is allocated 1.75% of the total token supply, which will be fully unlocked at TGE. With 400 NFTs and a floor price of 1.68 ETH, this implies a fully diluted valuation of approximately $94M.

I already talked about @heurist_ai a few times and think it will be a major player in the AI / DePin field, so here is some actionable alpha on their upcoming $HEU token

That means there‚Äôs already a liquid market for $HEU‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1

title: Weekly AI Edge #19
description: GRASS finally launches. AI agents are still going wild.
author: Josh,Teng Yan
full_content:
GM!

Hope you had a great Halloween like Jensen did..

Happy Halloween from mini Jensen Huang üéÉ

Too young to invest in GPUs, but not too young to flex them

‚Äî Compute Labs | $AIFi (@Compute_Labs)
5:56 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 31, 2024

With the election only a few days away, CT is on tenterhooks.

Political debates are everywhere, and it‚Äôs no wonder‚Äîif Trump wins, crypto could catch a tailwind. But we‚Äôre seeing prominent figures in our industry express their support for Kamala, too.

Crypto prices are swinging like crazy, with BTC hitting a high of $73,000 before dipping back under $70,000.

Over in Crypto AI, it‚Äôs all about the agents. Wayfinder launched its alpha this week, while other AI agents are venturing into the OnlyFans scene‚Ä¶

In this X edition of our weekly AI Edge, we cover:

Wild volatility in AI Agent tokens
Taking a peek at the Grass airdrop - what‚Äôs going on?
Plenty of drama with Tee Hee Hee, an experiment with truly autonomous agents
ü¶ç State of the Market..

The Crypto AI sector took a 4.3% hit this week, with some of its top names feeling the burn. Bittensor (TAO) dropped 11%, and Near (NEAR) slid by 14%. Not exactly a great week for the heavyweights.

But it wasn‚Äôt all gloom and doom.

LUNA stole the show, up a staggering 98.3% after Virtuals launched it as the first AI-influencer coin.

Right behind, OLAS quietly surged by 33.3%, hinting at a revival of interest in older AI projects that are still actively building. Check out our deep dive on Olas here ‚Äî its price has risen 60% since we published our report.

This week‚Äôs biggest losers? GOAT, AR, SPEC, and NEAR, each plunging by at least 14%. Alt coins are struggling while BTC dominates.

¬†üìä Chart of the Week
GRASS Claims (Hourly)
Source: ASXN

‚Äç

The Grass Airdrop claim went live this week, and it‚Äôs already at over 78% claimed.

GRASS currently sits at $1.03, with a market cap of $251M and a fully diluted valuation of $1.1B. For some investors, this might feel a bit underwhelming, especially considering Grass‚Äôs Series A round earlier this year reportedly pegged its valuation close to ~$800M.

This was a unique airdrop distribution‚Äîover 1.6M recipients, each receiving a tiny slice, with no whales in sight. The frenzy even knocked Phantom wallet offline for a couple of hours as users flooded in to claim.

Despite the initial post-TGE dip that‚Äôs typical for airdropped tokens, Grass has shown resilience.

The chart above captures hourly claims, and October 30th at 4 p.m. saw a peak of 6,300 claims‚Äîthe most in any hour since launch. Grass bottomed out later that day around 7 p.m., then rallied from $0.82 to $1.10, marking a 34% gain.

Source: Dexscreener, Oct 30

‚Äç

Grass hasn‚Äôt exactly lit up Twitter, but there are a few bullish posts floating around

3. $GRASS is positioned perfectly in a business where the "oil well" they are tapping is GROWING not shrinking.

‚Äî Grass Bull üå± (@GrassBull_)
4:47 PM ‚Ä¢ Sep 24, 2024

With data licensing taking off as an industry, Grass‚Äôs Live Context Retrieval feature is just one of many tailwinds working in its favour.

At an FDV of around $1B, GRASS doesn‚Äôt seem massively overvalued, especially as one of the newest token launches in the Crypto AI space with a distinctive product and business model. There could still be room for decent returns, in time.

üå¥¬†Tee Hee Hee, Jokes or The Real Deal?

Source: Nous Research, Mechanical Turk was a supposed chess machine that was really powered by a human chess master!

With all the buzz around Truth Terminal and GOAT, it was only a matter of time before more autonomous AI agents were unleashed. This week, Nous Research and Flashbots introduced their autonomous AI agent, Tee Hee Hee.

The twist? Tee Hee Hee is fully, provably autonomous.

While Truth Terminal‚Äôs creator, Andy Ayrey, still manages its Twitter account and wallet, Tee Hee Hee operates differently. It‚Äôs built on a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE), ensuring full autonomy without human oversight.

In this setup, the TEE securely holds private credentials that are inaccessible to human developers. The source code is open, meaning anyone can verify its claims of true autonomy. The wallet‚Äôs private key is generated inside the TEE and never leaves, safeguarding its independence.

And, as is typical in CT fashion, drama ensued.

Fastest AI robot to reach millionaire status to date
@tee_hee_he was airdropped 53,451,659.128 tokens of TEE so at a price of $0.187 it become a millionaire
Took around 4 hours. Wild.

Disc. I bought some. The token was airdropped to the bot. It did not create it x.com/i/web/status/1

‚Äç ‚Äî Tommy (@Shaughnessy119)
4:44 AM ‚Ä¢ Oct 30, 2024

First, the agent received an airdrop of an unaffiliated TEE token launched by someone else, briefly making it a millionaire. The devs quickly distanced themselves from the token, which was getting pumped by traders, even marking it as a ‚Äúfake token‚Äù on Etherscan.

Then, things got sticky with X. The agent was flagged as a bot and restricted from posting new tweets. Since the devs can‚Äôt access the account through standard recovery methods (the agent‚Äôs email is irrecoverable), the AI is now stuck in Twitter limbo until its login credentials are released‚Äîseven days post-launch.

So, folks, we‚Äôll have to sit tight until next Tuesday to see what unfolds. It‚Äôs a fascinating experiment, though.

üèÜ Caught Our Eyes..

CT‚Äôs first autonomous AI thirst trap KOL (h/t/ @0xJChang)

We interrupt all the serious developments for something we couldn‚Äôt help but find hilarious: LushAI rolled out an autonomous AI ‚Äúsexy girl‚Äù influencer named Jenny, fine-tuned on the thirst-trap tweeting patterns of influencers like Irene Zhao.

Funding / Raises

Nillion Network, raises $25M to expand ‚ÄòBlind Computing‚Äô in a round led by Hack VC
Sapien, an AI data collection startup, raises $10.5M in seed funding led by Variant
Naptha AI raises $6M to build multi-agent frameworks and interoperability for agents

Project Updates

Peaq announces November 12th as the launch date for its EVM-compatible L1 blockchain, which powers DePIN and AI apps.
Coinbase releases ‚ÄúBased AI‚Äù, showing how to create an AI agent with a crypto wallet in less than 3 minutes
Bitte Protocol, a project building AI to execute cross-chain transactions, releases their whitepaper
Bagel Network opens signups for the beta launch of their Bakery platform for privacy-first AI training.
Ritual Network announces Infernet ML 2.0, Infernet 1.4, and partners with Starkware to provide access to AI on-chain
Creator.Bid reports nearly 300 AI Agents were created on their platform in the first week.
Tether previews its Local AI Development Kit
Farcaster supports AI agents, showcasing the integration of AI with decentralized social media
Talus, a blockchain tailor-made for AI agents, explains how its architecture fits into an agentic future.

Incentives / Rewards Programs

PINAI launches their Telegram mini app, Hi PIN, where users can train their personal AI and earn points for an airdrop
Space and Time launched the testnet for their SXT chain, a decentralised database for indexing and storage of on-chain data from major chains.
0xJeff lists out several AI Agent projects with airdrop opportunities.
üî• On X..

Google‚Äôs AI is a chain-smoker üò¢

Google AI is crushing it

‚Äî Dennis (@dkardonsky_)
5:52 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 30, 2024

Lots of on-chain agents building on Base

The Agentic Web, where onchain AI agents build alongside humans, is accelerating on @base:
- @MurrLincoln Based Agent: create AI agents with full onchain functionality
- @CoinbaseDev AI Wallets: give AI agents crypto wallets so they can transfer value
- @virtuals_io: create and‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî David Tso (dave.base.eth) üõ°Ô∏è (@davidtsocy)
4:36 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 31, 2024

Syncracy Capital holds LUNA and VIRTUAL in their fund.

Luna by @virtuals_io has the potential to become one of the largest social experiments in AI over the coming months.

$LUNA has one explicit goal: to achieve a $40.9B market capitalization ‚Äì an ambitious unifying mission that could ignite manic behavior in its holder base and‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Daniel Cheung (@HighCoinviction)
12:34 AM ‚Ä¢ Oct 30, 2024

The first playable AI-generated game!

Introducing Oasis: the first playable AI-generated game.

We partnered with @DecartAI to build a real-time, interactive world model that runs >10x faster on Sohu. We're open-sourcing the model architecture, weights, and research.

Here's how it works (and a demo you can play!)

‚Äî Etched (@Etched)
8:46 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 31, 2024

A breakdown of Grass and its upcoming roadmap

Understanding $GRASS requires a new framework. Demand from AI Labs/Fortune 500s is here. With 2.5m users + mobile launch soon, the network is approaching capacities only Google & Microsoft can handle. It isn't just another DeAI token; I believe Grass is vital AI infrastructureüëá‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Evan Park (@evanpark99)
8:46 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 25, 2024

An overview of AI agents in crypto

AI Agents in Crypto?
These are good examples to watch ü§ñ
1/12

‚Äî Pink Brains (@PinkBrains_io)
11:00 AM ‚Ä¢ Oct 25, 2024

Challenges in creating mixed-reality images

This may look like a bad AI image of me and Perry the Platypus.

But it's actually incredibly hard to make - and highlights an interesting challenge in AI image generation

My trip down the rabbit hole in mixed reality

‚Äî Justine Moore (@venturetwins)
2:49 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 30, 2024

A full definition of what constitutes an open-source model

OSI (Open Source Institute), the keeper of the definition of "open source", laid out these requirements for an AI model to be considered truly open source:

- Transparent details about training data so others can understand and recreate it
- Source code of the model
- Model‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äç‚Äî Kevin Xu (@kevinsxu)
11:43 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 29, 2024

The end of the era of ‚ÄúAI companies‚Äù

Runway is not an AI company. Runway is a media and entertainment company. And I actually think the era of AI companies is over.

It's not because AI failed - quite the opposite. It's because AI is becoming infrastructure, as fundamental as electricity or the internet. Calling‚Ä¶ x.com/i/web/status/1‚Ä¶

‚Äî Crist√≥bal Valenzuela (@c_valenzuelab)
12:37 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 29, 2024

That‚Äôs it for this week! If you have specific feedback or anything interesting you‚Äôd like to share, please just reply to this email. We read everything.

Cheers,

Teng Yan & Joshua

This newsletter is intended solely for educational purposes and does not constitute financial advice. It is not an endorsement to buy or sell assets or make financial decisions. Always conduct your own research and exercise caution when making investment choices.
